eki chodanawa sambandhayen thama niwaradikaru bawa thahawuru kirimata mage sewadayakaya wetha karunu athi bawath, eheth mema naduwa wibhagayata yomukara aththe hitapu janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga mahatha sil mathawanta sil redi bedadima sandaha mudal anumatha karana ladayi wathman rajaya idiripath kala chodanawata waradakaru karamin ohuta siradanduwam niyama kala gihan kulathunga winisuruthuman idiripita bawinda ema thinduwedi deshapalana matha prakashayak athulath kara athi bawinda, thawaduratath mage sewadayakayata erehi barapathala aparadha wimarshana komisame samajikayakuwa sitimin mema karunu wibhagayata sambandha wu ema winisuruthuman hamuwema mahadhikarana naduwada wibhagayata ganima prashnagatha bawinda nadu wibhagaya wenath winisuruthumaku ho thumiyaka hamuwe wibhagayata yomu karana lesa itha gaurawayen gaurawaniya ugath winisuru mandullen illa sitina bawath janadhipathi nithignya musthapa mahatha kiya sitiyeya.

siriyawe gatha kala palamu masa thuna thula thorbrand eekakaya aakramana sandaha sahabhagi wiya.rathri kalaye thrasthawadinge bala pradeshawalata rahase athulu wi sathurange sthanagatha wima,sankhyawa saha ema pradeshaye owun bhawitha karana sangramika upakrama aadiya sambandhawa oththu balimata mema kandayama kriya karana ladi.ee sandaha dron yana bhawitha kara thibe.inpasu thrasthawadinge pradhana sapayum sthana winasha karana ayuru salasum kerini.grishma ruthuwedi thorbrand eekakayata wenath karyayan pawarini.inpasuwa owuhu nitharama sangrama bhumiya thula awida yamin ehi bimbomba walalime yedini.ehi aramuna wuye islamiya rajya thrasthawadinta adala pradeshawala nidahase gaman kirima athi hakiyawa adala kirimayi.islamiya rajya thrasthawadin pasubasa yaddi ema pradesha athpath kara gaththe elesayi.
